input.sentences: she was so excited to finally visit grandma 's house .
the little red tricycle was always so fun to ride .
her sister and grandma sat on the porch as they watched her play .
she even gave her sister a chance to ride it .
her sister was so excited to play too .
output.sentences: When i was a girl I always had fun things to do.
I would ride my bike outside some days.
Others I would sit on the porch with my grandma and enjoy the weather.
Sometimes my friends would come outside and play with me too.
When the day is over, I am sad to put my bike away.
